item.title: Trump’s Tariffs Are Part of a ‘Tectonic Plate Shift’ in the Global Economy
item.description: Peter R. Orszag, the C.E.O. of Lazard, discusses how markets are reacting to the uncertainty of Trump’s tariffs.

item.title: Marine Le Pen’s ‘Witch Hunt’ Talk Echoes Trump. Will It Work in France?
item.description: After years trying to moderate her party’s image, the far-right leader, convicted of embezzlement, now voices Trump-like outrage, at some risk.
